description:
Dartz launches the final phase of his plan by having his minions of Orichalcos Soldiers attack all around the world, leaving Yugi and gang with no one left to trust!  With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Jonouchi from his friends for a final showdown with Mai’s heart on the line! How can Joey beat Valon by himself when both Ryuji and Rebecca couldn’t even leave a dent in Valon’s armor?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突! 城之内VS[ヴァーサス]ヴァロン
